meanings.sent1: The nearliest tree to our house is the big oak in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The nearliest grocery store is just a short walk away.
meanings.sent3: I can almost touch the nearliest cloud in the sky!
meanings.sent4: The nearliest mountain seemed to embrace the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The nearliest star in the sky twinkled brightly above us.

meanings.sent1: The nearliest bus arrives at 8:00 AM every morning.
meanings.sent2: The nearliest appointment is at 2:30 PM.
meanings.sent3: I woke up at the nearliest hour to catch the sunrise.
meanings.sent4: The nearliest moment of the day is when the sun sets.
meanings.sent5: The nearliest deadline is approaching fast.

meanings.sent1: She is my nearliest friend; we do everything together.
meanings.sent2: The nearliest color to blue is indigo.
meanings.sent3: The nearliest book to a fairytale was the encyclopedia.
meanings.sent4: His nearliest relative is his twin brother.
meanings.sent5: The nearliest match for her outfit was the red shoes.
